Instalando tidyverse

```{r}
if (!require("tidyverse")) install.packages("tidyverse")
data("mtcars")
```


```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  rownames_to_column("cars") %>% 
  mutate(cars = fct_reorder(cars, carb)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cars, carb)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()
```
